description:
While coach is in the hospital, the group visits him. He informs them that he will be ready before the Cosplay World Series.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kessen! Ooizumihigashi Gakuen Taiikukan wa Akaku Moete Iru!
The Decisive Battle! The Gym is Full of Beauties!
決戦! 大泉東学園体育館は赤く萌えている!
